snippet.title: Kingdom's Deck - Game Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
You can now wishlist the game on Steam:  http://s.team/a/2655590 ⚔️

Kingdom's Deck is a city-builder and deck-builder game where you embark on a journey to transform your humble hamlet into a formidable empire. Deploy your cards wisely, defend your walls from sieges, manage your resources, respond to various exciting events, and create the ultimate Kingdom's deck!
